kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Clear Text
kw.doc: Clears the text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.
kw.msg: Running command 'adb shell input keyevent 66 keyevent 66 2>&1'.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Text
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `text`.
